message: ODBC? not right now, bit probably not hard if there's python drivers

Give you users some sample queries and they can quickly learn how to tweak them
This looks great for someone poor at wrting SQL, like me. I can't wait to try it out on my own databases

I tried this before coming the conference and was very pleased with the ease of installation and how easy it was to get started outputting data. I'm hoping it can help us ease our support burden by letting frontline tech support get customer's needs answered more quickly.
Alex - it'd be great if you had any feedback (either success or otherwise) so that we can improve things.
